name: Beefy Joe Vs. The Zombie Apocalypse
name_original: Beefy Joe Vs. The Zombie Apocalypse
description:
Chosen Theme:
You Are The Last Hope
Plot:
In the town of Whereverville, right in the middle of Florida, lives the gym-aficionado Beefy Joe.

Meanwhile, a zombie apocalypse starts without notice, and ruins the whole of
society, but Beefy Joe doesn't give up... he has his gun!!

Now, can Beefy Joe defend what's left of Whereverville, and blast away some
zombies!?

Controls:
WASD for movement, J for shooting where Beefy Joe is facing.
